author: Scott Bowles
text: Does anyone out there have a policy document they send to departments during budget time?  Various departments where I work have shown interest in a policy document that outlines their responsibilities during the initial budget process and throughout the fiscal year.  Any examples or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
title: Budgeting Policy for Departments
